attributes.action: Give a safe haven to afganistani interpreters who worked with the British army
attributes.background: Interpreters and their families have been left at the mercy of the Taliban

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106218

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
